New Records: Liam Livingstone hit 87 off 47 with five sixes and six fours in his 50th T20 match.
Matthew Short took a shock maiden five-wicket haul.
Key Match Events: Liam Livingstone and Jacob Bethell shared 90 runs off 47 balls to lead England's chase.
Matthew Short's five-wicket haul was a turning point.
Adil Rashid secured a three-wicket win with six balls to spare.
Post-Match Reflections: Liam Livingstone and Jacob Bethell's partnership was crucial.
Matthew Short's performance was a standout moment.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The series winner will be decided on September 15.
England required 104 from the last 10 overs.
